experience.title: Effortless Payment Technology, Anytime, Anywhere. Simple Driver Experience.
experience.text: Leading with our revolutionary Hozah Autopay solution, we offer a suite of payment options for drivers, reducing friction when switching from your existing parking solutions and giving drivers the easiest ways to pay on arrival or exit.

list.title: Hozah Autopay
list.subtitle: Frictionless driver experience. Increased compliance.
list.text: After a one-time setup by the driver, our industry-unique technology takes automatic, accurate payment each time they visit your car park.

list.title: Pay by Web
list.subtitle: Simple user experience for one-time payments
list.text: Needing only an internet connection, Hozah's web-based app takes on-the-day payments in no time at all.

list.title: Season Tickets
list.subtitle: Guaranteed, recurring revenue
list.text: Our unique ANPR-based payment technology enables charging drivers based on several criteria including account, vehicle, and usage.

list.title: Smart Kiosks
list.subtitle: Easy-to-use physical payments
list.text: Hozah offers state-of-the-art payment kiosks linked to ANPR cameras for drivers preferring to make payments onsite.
